title: abhinav94
author: abhinav94
content: Hello,We are looking for someone who can create a custom telegram bot for a crypto project. In bot, users need to perform just a small talk AND THEY WILL GET THE REWARD. If there is any lead then contact at Telegram: @saloni_jn

comments.author: dimonstration
comments.body: Quote from: abhinav94 on September 02, 2022, 07:07:58 AMHello,We are looking for someone who can create a custom telegram bot for a crypto project. In bot, users need to perform just a small talk AND THEY WILL GET THE REWARD. If there is any lead then contact at Telegram: @saloni_jn Will you mind sharing the reward details so that I can forward this to my friend that can do this kind of customized bot. The bot replies a certain line whenever the keyword is type on the group chat. He can program as many line as possible as if the bot is a real user that answering post on GC. I already contact you on your telegram before I write this post since you are not available on TG.
